name: stix (molen)
description:
a 6x6 pixel game by @TheRealMolen for #lowrezjam 2018

i thought it might be fun to try and make a game with only 36 pixels, and what I came up with was this - part musical game, part 16 step sequencer

audio is critical - this is a music game!

please enjoy!

when the screen is grey, it's playing you a rhythm.
when it turns orange, it's playing back your attempt to match that rhythm!

-----<: CONTROLS :>-----

1  2  3  4
q  w  e  r
a  s  d  f
z  x  c  v

pressing these buttons changes what sound plays on a certain beat of the rhythm. keep pressing to cycle through the available sounds!

try holding SHIFT or ALT

----<: cheatmode :>----

iwin
